Back in the day, I would highly recommend CS:GO to everyone. But ever since it was released to the public for free, I started having second thoughts. This game is now full of hackers/cheaters. Every match will have at least one cheater of some sort. This matter wasn't that prominent when you actually had to purchase the game. Now that it's available for free, cheaters could just create multiple accounts and ruin the game experience. Prime doesn't do much of difference either. About 6 out of the 10 matches you join there's bound to be hacker in them.
